title: BRIEF-Gammon Infrastructure Projects Says Kishore Kumar Mohanty To Continue As MD
text:
BRIEF-Gammon Infrastructure Projects Says Kishore Kumar Mohanty To Continue As MD

Stock Markets 1 hour ago (Oct 10, 2019 20:00)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Gammon Infrastructure Projects Says Kishore Kumar Mohanty To Continue As MD Oct 10 (Reuters) - Gammon Infrastructure Projects Ltd : * GAMMON INFRASTRUCTURE PROJECTS LTD - KISHORE KUMAR MOHANTY CONSENTED AND AGREED TO CONTINUE AS MANAGING DIRECTOR UPTO AN EXTENDED PERIOD OF 3 MONTHS

BRIEF-Gammon Infrastructure Projects Says Kishore Kumar Mohanty To Continue As MD
